Package edu.uga.cs1302.txtbuff

Interface Summary
Editable The interface Editable holds the methods append, insert, and replace.
 

Class Summary
EditableTextLine The EditableTextLine class extend from the class TextLine and implements the interface Editable.
TextLine TextLine class holds all the methods related to the text line, _TextLine.
 

Exception Summary
TextLineIndexOutOfBoundsException TextLineIndexOutOfBoundsException class extends from IndexOutOfBoundsException.
